entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 10:53 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
